#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <map>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <cmath>
#include <cassert>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <vector>
#include <utility>
#include <algorithm>
#include <queue>
 
#define MOD 1000000007
#define INF 99999999
#define ONLINE_JUDGE
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=(a);(i)<(b);i++)
#define MAX(a,b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define MIN(a,b) ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
 
typedef unsigned long long ULL;
typedef long long LL;
 
using namespace std;

struct node
{
    int x,y,cost;
};
 
int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
    //freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif
    int nr;
    int temp[105][105];
    char s[105][105];
    scanf("%d%*c",&nr);
    FOR(i,0,nr)
    {
        scanf("%s",s[i]);
    }
    int nc=strlen(s[1]);
    memset(temp,0,sizeof(temp));
    queue <node> Q;

    node n;
    n.x = 0,n.y = 0,n.cost = 1;
    Q.push(n);
    int level=0;
    while(!Q.empty()){
        node p = Q.front();
        //fprintf(stderr, "i = %d j = %d cost = %d\n",p.x,p.y,p.cost );
        temp[p.x][p.y] = 1;
        if(p.x == nr - 1 && p.y == nc - 1){
            std::cout << p.cost << endl;
            break;
        } 
        Q.pop();
        for(int i=p.x-1;i<=p.x+1;i++){
            for(int j=p.y-1;j<=p.y+1;++j){
                if(i < 0 || i >= nr || j < 0 || j >= nc ) continue;
                if(s[i][j] == '1' || temp[i][j]) continue;
                node dummy;
                dummy.x = i,dummy.y = j;
                dummy.cost = p.cost+1;
                Q.push(dummy);
            }
        }
    }

    return 0;
}
